Traits.Name: Aerosol Aura
Traits.Content: The macro-virus emanates a 10-foot radius aura. Creatures that start their turn in this aura must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 stack of Viral Load.

Traits.Name: Viral Load
Traits.Content: A creature with 1 stack has disadvantage on attack rolls and checks. At 3 or more stacks, the creature is poisoned and cannot regain hit points until the end of its next turn. A successful save reduces the stacks by 1 at the end of the creature's turn.

Actions.Name: Puncture Charge
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, dealing 19 (3d8 + 6) piercing damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 stack of Viral Load. If the target is affected by this condition, the macro-virus can use Spike Burst as a bonus action on its next turn.

Actions.Name: Viral Spike Assault
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, dealing 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage. This action can only be used on a creature that has 1 or more stacks of Viral Load.

Actions.Name: Rolling Charge
Actions.Content: The macro-virus rolls forward in a 30 ft. line. Each creature in the line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (3d6 bludgeoning + 2d4 piercing) damage on a failed save and is knocked prone. On a success, a creature takes half damage and is not knocked prone. Creatures that fail the saving throw also gain 1 stack of Viral Load.
